page.title: 18HOME & FAMILY IN SOUTHREPPS
page.content: High percentage of retired people,but av. young family consists of 2 parents two children and a pet with majority of parents wage earning and owning their own home. T.V. set and computer prevalent. Individual family members pursue personal interests during week- days. Sparse public transport calls for parental transportation of child- ren to school, etc. Weekends are family orientated, with car outings, walking, etc. popular pasttimes. Weekly trips to large stores for groceries, frozen and convenience foods. Kitchen appliances i.e. micro wave ovens, sandwich makers, etc. cater for fast and simple foods. Interests for young people include sport, BMX bikes, uniformed young peoples activites, chess, drama, etc., though unfortunately for many activ- ities they have to leave the village.
